properties.displayName: _CSGP: Sentinel Health - Webhook Calls Approaching Limit
properties.description:
Logic apps have a webhook limit of 1500 . In order to detect if we are close to hitting that limit, this query detects when logic app trigger "send data" exceeds more than 1000 operations per second.

Handling Guidance: https://costar-group-prod-dev.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SCSP/pages/390039244/General+Incident+Report+Handling+Guidance
